text: Use a different mixer until the end of the game
$NAME if you've already peed since the start of the night, drink 3 times. Otherwise give out 3 sips
$NAME, you are the black hole! Each time someone has to drink, you drink a sip for them

followUp.text: $NAME, you are no longer the black hole

text: $NAME has control of $NAME's phone until further notice

followUp.text: $NAME no longer has control of $NAME's phone

text: 'Electronic devices', first to run out of ideas drinks 4 times. $NAME, you start
Each player can give out as many sips as they have first names. $NAME, you start
Chug! First person to finish their drink gets to fill up someone's glass and make them down it
$NAME, stare at $NAME until told otherwise

followUp.text: $NAME no longer has to stare at $NAME

text: $NAME, send 'I love you' to a person chosen by $NAME, or drink 5 times
Anyone who lived in more than 3 towns drink 2 times
$NAME, you have 5 minutes to finish your drink
Truth or dare with the person to your right, $NAME starts
The first person to touch $NAME's feet gives out 3 sips
If you've repeated a year in school drink 4 times
If you've been on a gap year drink twice
The person to left of $NAME drinks 3 times
$NAME ask a question out loud to the group, first person to answer gives out 3 sips
If you own an Android device drink 3 times
If you own an Apple device drink 3 times
If you say either yes or no, you have to take 2 sips

followUp.text: You can say yes and no again
